name: oppgplus
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5
body: |- wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))

stmt.origin: eqtri(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c3, c0), co(c0, ctpos(c3), c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))
-| wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, ctpos(c3), c2))
-| wceq(co(c0, ctpos(c3), c2), co(c2, c3, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))
-| wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, ctpos(c3), c2))
-| wceq(co(c0, ctpos(c3), c2), co(c2, c3, c0))

body.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, ctpos(c3), c2))
-| wceq(c1, ctpos(c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))
-| wceq(co(c0, ctpos(c3), c2), co(c2, c3, c0))
-| wceq(c1, ctpos(c3))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, ctpos(c3))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c4))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(coppg, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))
-| wceq(co(c0, ctpos(c3), c2), co(c2, c3, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c4))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(coppg, c4))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5))

body.origin: |- wceq(co(c0, ctpos(c3), c2), co(c2, c3, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c4))
-| wceq(c5, cfv(coppg, c4))

comment: Value of the addition operation of an opposite ring. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Fan Zheng, 26-Jun-2016.)
